channel.title: Resumes on Ivo Camargo - Web Developer and Game Developer
channel.description: Recent content in Resumes on Ivo Camargo - Web Developer and Game Developer

item.title: Full Web Developer and Game Developer (Full time and Freelance)
item.description: Freelancing using various web technologies. Maintenance of web systems and private servers for online multiplayer games. Development of web systems and games in general.

item.title: Game Developer and Full Stack Web Developer (Full-Time)
item.description: DISCLAIMER: The "company" did not compensate its employees, and we experienced non-payment, bad faith and scam from them, so I decided to make my part of the project open-source.

item.title: Junior Game Developer and Front-End Developer (Full-Time)
item.description: Development of casino and videobingo web games produced for Ortiz Gaming.

item.title: NFT Game Developer and Full Stack Web Developer (Freelance)
item.description: Oni Mansion is an online multiplayer NFT casual game where players can decorate their homes with spooky decorations and haunt each other’s houses.

item.title: NFT Game Developer and Full Stack Web Developer (Full-Time)
item.description: Solstead Surreal World is a Web-based NFT social multiplayer online game with gameplay similar to Club Penguin, where the player has an NFT character and can purchase NFT land within a metaverse. Note: The Solstead Surreal World that I developed has been archived, and its foundation was reused to create Solstead Arcade games.
